title: FPS Drop?
body:
So a month ago I got a pretty damn good computer. It played League at around 120 FPS. But, ever since the 2 most recent Microsoft Updates, my frame rate has dropped to about 50-60 FPS. 

Is this happening to anyone else? If so, how did you fix it?

replies.body:
I've seen this quite a bit since the Windows 10 Anniversary update went out. This is usually caused by the Game DVR feature inside the Windows Game Bar, since it was enabled by that anniversary update. I strongly recommend [disabling the game bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
